Frankfurt on Main, 7 Harvest-month
i.e. August.
1879

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of 12 June this year with which your kindness again pleased us by kindly communication of your work The native plants of Victoria, Part 1,
B79.06.04. we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.
